channel.title: Nobody can log into my server
channel.description: A few people decided to test my server. I gave them the IP and port, and they say they can't log in. Please help!

item.title: Nobody can log into my server
item.dc:creator: @flipmc flipmc
item.description:
@flipmc wrote:

[size=12pt]2nd Choice:[/size]
Step 1/ Go to www.no-ip.com and register.
Step 2/ Runserver & give them the “no-ip”.
Step 3/ Put your CORRECT port, and then tell them to put it as their new port.

Enjoy

(If it doesn’t work, show some pictures}
[hr]
[size=8pt]Owner Of:[/size] [size=8pt]AbandonedScape[/size]
[size=8pt]Credits:[/size] [size=8pt]Flip & LeScape PK[/size]
[size=8pt]Progess: [ [size=8pt]|[/size][size=8pt]|||||||||[/size] ]

Read full topic

item.title: Nobody can log into my server
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

[quote=“Pure str433, post:8, topic:105781”]Maybe u got an error on ur server or that
u dont double click compile then type “r” to
run ur server[/quote]

I compile. No errors. I run it after that.

item.source: Nobody can log into my server

item.title: Nobody can log into my server
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

[quote=“Pure str433, post:6, topic:105781”]Gave them YOUR Ip on your ham at the top
of the hamachi thing, Gave the PROPPER port
(which is usually 5555 or 43594) And made sure that theyre
accounts are not already logged in… (Sometimes it does that)[/quote]

I haven’t released it yet, so their account can’t be logged in, They say that they get “error connecting to server. Server must be down”. Yes I gave them my Ham IP, and my port - I checked it like 3 times, there’s no mistake.

Read full topic

item.title: Nobody can log into my server
item.dc:creator: @gunztheduel gunztheduel
item.description:
@gunztheduel wrote:

Budda:

Forward ports. Check firewall. Check server is up. If all fails, Hamachi is your best bet.

Did all those things.

[quote=“Pure str433, post:3, topic:105781”]If you give them an Ip, you mus give them
hamachi network so people can join,… if you dont
have hamach download it somewhere i cant remember :o[/quote]

They joined network.

Grantypeno:

www.hamachi.cc is where you can download hamachi,

Got that.

Read full topic
